def.dt: :a party or other special event that you have for an important occasion, holiday, etc. a victory/birthday/holiday celebration the town's bicentennial celebrations

:the activity of doing special, enjoyable things for an important occasion, achievement, etc. :the activity of celebrating It was a night of celebration. We're having a dinner in celebration of their anniversary. [=as a way of celebrating their anniversary] Your promotion is (a) cause for celebration.
:the performance of a religious ceremony usually singular a celebration of Mass
